'''Antivirus (or ''anti-virus'') [[software]]''' is used to prevent, detect, and remove [[malware]], including [[computer virus]]es, [[computer worm|worms]], and [[Trojan horse (computing)|trojan horses]]. Such programs may also prevent and remove [[adware]], [[spyware]], and other forms of malware.
'''Antivirus (or ''anti-virus'') [[software]]''' is used to prevent, detect, and remove [[malware]], including [[computer virus]]es, [[computer worm|worms]], and [[Trojan horse (computing)|trojan horses]]. Such programs may also prevent and remove [[adware]], [[spyware]], and other forms of malware.
